label: 錦
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: A generic term for textiles with multicolored yarns, nishiki also refers more specifically to compound weaves with more than one set of warps or wefts. Tate nishiki (also keikin) is a warp-faced compound twill and nuki nishiki (also ikin) is a weft-faced compound twill. See Warp-faced compound weave and Weft-face compound weave. [縦錦、緯錦]
